mapper.insert: insert into tb_post(post_num, board_num, user_id, post_title, post_content) values (#{post_num}, #{board_num}, #{user_id}, #{post_title}, #{post_content})
insert into tb_files(file_num, file_path, post_num, save_file_name, original_file_name) values (#{file_num}, #{file_path}, #{post_num}, #{save_file_name}, #{original_file_name})
mapper.select: select ifnull((select concat('P', lpad(substr(max(post_num), 2, 8) + 1, 7, '0')) from tb_post), 'P0000001') as maxPostNo from dual
select ifnull((select concat('F', lpad(substr(max(file_num), 2, 8) + 1, 3, '0')) from tb_files where post_num = #{post_num}), 'F001') as maxPostNo from dual

select concat(files.file_path, files.save_file_name) as file_path, files.save_file_name, files.original_file_name, post.post_num as post_num, post.post_title as post_title, post.update_date as update_date from tb_post as post join tb_files as files on post.post_num = files.post_num where post.board_num = 'B0000001' and files.file_num = 'F001' and post.is_used = 'Y' order by post_num desc
